pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Regression via Smoothing Splines // Multiple and generalized nonparametric regression using smoothing spline ANOVA models and generalized additive models, as described in Helwig (2020) doi:10.4135/9781526421036885885. Includes support for Gaussian and non-Gaussian responses, smoothers for multiple types of predictors, interactions between smoothers of mixed types, and eight different methods for smoothing parameter selection.
